instruction: Summarize the following article into a tweet (140 characters max).
input: According to a new study conducted in the U.S. and Canada, dogs have the ability to understand their human partner’s point of view. Dogs can recognize the difference between a situation familiar to them and one that is new to them, and adjust their behavior accordingly.
output: New study reveals that dogs understand their owners' point of view and adjust their behavior accordingly. #dogs #study #humanpartners #perspective #behavior
